tags.name: PushAuthenticationGameState
tags.description: Returns the push token for the game state channel

tags.name: AreGamesInProgress
tags.description: Returns true if there is at least one game being played at the time of the request or false if there are none.

tags.name: ByeWeeks
tags.description: Get bye weeks for the teams during a specified NFL season.

tags.name: SeasonCurrent
tags.description: Year of the current NFL season. This value changes at the start of the new NFL league year. The earliest season for Fantasy data is 2001. The earliest season for Team data is 1985. The earliest season for Fantasy data is 2001. The earliest season for Team data is 1985.

tags.name: SeasonLastCompleted
tags.description: Year of the most recently completed season. this value changes immediately after the Super Bowl. The earliest season for Fantasy data is 2001. The earliest season for Team data is 1985.

tags.name: SeasonUpcoming
tags.description: Year of the current NFL season, if we are in the mid-season. If we are in the off-season, then year of the next upcoming season. This value changes immediately after the Super Bowl. The earliest season for Fantasy data is 2001. The earliest season for Team data is 1985.

tags.name: WeekCurrent
tags.description: Number of the current week of the NFL season. This value usually changes on Tuesday nights or Wednesday mornings at midnight ET.

tags.name: WeekLastCompleted
tags.description: Number of the last completed week of the NFL season. This value usually changes on Tuesday nights or Wednesday mornings at midnight ET.

tags.name: WeekUpcoming
tags.description: Number of the upcoming week of the NFL season. This value usually changes on Tuesday nights or Wednesday mornings at midnight ET.

tags.name: Referees
tags.description: Returns full list of NFL Referees

tags.name: SchedulesLegacy
tags.description: Game schedule for a specified season.

tags.name: Schedules
tags.description: Game schedule for a specified season.

tags.name: ScoresByDateLegacy
tags.description: Get game scores for a specified week of a season.

tags.name: ScoresBySeasonLegacy
tags.description: Game scores for a specified season.

tags.name: ScoresByWeekLegacy
tags.description: Get game scores for a specified week of a season.

tags.name: ScoresByWeekSimulation
tags.description: Gets simulated live scores of NFL games, covering the Conference Championship games on January 21, 2018.

tags.name: ScoresByWeek
tags.description: Get game scores for a specified week of a season.

tags.name: Stadiums
tags.description: This method returns all stadiums.

tags.name: TeamsActive
tags.description: Gets all active teams.

tags.name: TeamsAll
tags.description: Gets all teams, including pro bowl teams.

tags.name: TeamsBySeason
tags.description: List of teams playing in a specified season.

tags.name: Teams
tags.description: Gets all teams, including pro bowl teams.

tags.name: DepthCharts
tags.description: Depth charts for all NFL teams split by offensive, defensive, and special teams position groupings.

tags.name: TeamGameLogsBySeason
tags.description: Game by game log of total team statistics.

tags.name: Timeframes
tags.description: Get detailed information about past, present, and future timeframes.

tags.name: BettingMetadata
tags.description: Returns the list of MarketTypes, BetTypes, PeriodTypes, OutcomeTypes, and ResultTypes to map the IDs to descriptive names. Also includes a list of the MarketType, BetType  PeriodType combinations which we will have resulting for.

tags.name: BettingEventsByDate
tags.description: The list of current BettingEvents for the given date. Events in this include market information but no outcomes will be included here. Intended to allow both visibility to Events in order to match up Events - Scores via the included ScoreID (where applicable) as well as provide a list of MarketIDs which are included in the given event.

tags.name: BettingEventsBySeason
tags.description: Returns the full list of BetttingEvents for the given season. This does not take season-type (PRE/POST etc) into account. Intended for those who need to tie BettingEventIDs to ScoreIDs.

tags.name: BettingFuturesBySeason
tags.description: Returns available Futures outcomes for the given season. Does not include line movement.

tags.name: BettingMarket
tags.description: Returns full line movement for a given BettingMarket. Is intended for historical data purposes and not for the most up to the second lines.

tags.name: BettingMarketsByEvent
tags.description: Returns the markets and available outcomes for a given BettingEventID.

tags.name: BettingMarketsByGameIDFormerlyBettingMarketsByScoreID
tags.description: Returns the markets and available outcomes for a given ScoreID. Works the same as by BettingEventID but requires less ID mapping.

tags.name: BettingMarketsByMarketType
tags.description: Returns Markets and available outcomes for a given event and market type requested. A lighter call than by BettingEventID as it only includes markets tagged with the specific MarketType (1 - GameLines, 2 - Player Props, etc -- full list available in the BettingMetaData endpoint).

tags.name: BettingPlayerPropsByGameIDFormerlyBettingPlayerPropsByScoreID
tags.description: Gets the available player props Markets  Outcomes for a given ScoreID.

tags.name: BettingResultsByMarket
tags.description: Returns all outcomes under this market which have a result type associated. Will return empty list if resulting has not yet processed for the given game. Resulting processes shortly after game closing.

tags.name: BettingSplitsByBettingMarketId
tags.description: List of Money and Bet Percentage splits for each outcome type available in this market. This specific endpoint will return the movement from this market as well as the most recent.

tags.name: DFSSlateOwnershipProjectionsBySlateID
tags.description: Slate Ownership Projections for a specific slate. Projections are for GPP format ownership. Will return an empty list if the slate is not yet projected or not a slate we have projections for.

tags.name: UpcomingDFSSlateOwnershipProjections
tags.description: Grabs DFS Slates which have not yet started for which we have DFS Ownership projections.

tags.name: BettingSplitsByGameIDFormerlyBettingSplitsByScoreID
tags.description: List of Money and Bet Percentage splits for each market and their respective outcome types available in this game. This specific endpoint will return current splits for each available market and no line movement.

tags.name: InGameOddsByWeek
tags.description: Provides in-play odds data for a given week. This means odds for games which are in-progress. Only serves the most recently seen data  does not include line movement.

tags.name: InGameOddsLineMovement
tags.description: Provides in-play odds line movement data for a given game. This means odds for games which are in-progress. Serves full line movement and is intended for showing the trend over a game rather than the most up-to-the second lines.

tags.name: PeriodGameOddsByWeek
tags.description: Returns the non-full-game odds for games in a given week  season. This means odds such as 1st-half or 1st-quarter, rather than full game. Only returns the most recently seen odds, not-including line movement.

tags.name: PeriodGameOddsLineMovement
tags.description: Returns the non-full-game odds for games in a given ScoreID. This means odds such as 1st-half or 1st-quarter, rather than full game. Returns the full line movement for the given game. This endpoint has a longer cache as it is meant for historical data/line movement rather than the most up to the second line.

tags.name: PreGameOddsByWeek
tags.description: Returns the full-game core odds for games in a given week  season. This means moneyline, spread, and total. Only returns the most recently seen odds, not-including line movement.

tags.name: PreGameOddsLineMovement
tags.description: Returns the full-game core odds for a given ScoreID. This means moneyline, spread, and total. Only returns the most recently seen odds, not-including line movement. This endpoint has a longer cache as it is meant for historical data/line movement rather than the most up to the second line.

tags.name: BettingTrendsByMatchup
tags.description: Returns trends data for a given pairing of teams. Will return data even if the teams are not set to play this season. Intended for use on a specific game though it will work for other comparisons if applicable.

tags.name: InjuredPlayers
tags.description: This endpoint provides all currently injured NFL players, along with injury details.

tags.name: SportsbooksActive
tags.description: Returns a list for mapping SportsbookID to the Sportsbook name.

tags.name: BettingTrendsByTeam
tags.description: Describes recent team trends and performance against betting data in recent sets of games

tags.name: BoxScoresDeltaV
tags.description: This method returns all box scores for a given season and week, but only returns player stats that have changed in the last X minutes. You can also filter by type of player stats to include, such as traditional fantasy players, IDP players or all players.

tags.name: BoxScoresVSimulation
tags.description: Gets simulated live box scores of NFL games, covering the Conference Championship games on January 21, 2018.

tags.name: FantasyPlayersWithADP
tags.description: This method returns a comprehensive list of draftable fantasy football players, including QB, RB, WR, TE, K and DEF.  Players are sorted by ADP (AverageDraftPosition).

tags.name: Schedule
tags.description: Game schedule for a specified season.

tags.name: GamesByDateFormerlyScoresByDate
tags.description: Get game scores for a specified week of a season.

tags.name: GamesBySeasonFormerlyScoresBySeason
tags.description: Game scores for a specified season.

tags.name: GamesByWeekFormerlyScoresByWeek
tags.description: Get game scores for a specified week of a season.

tags.name: GamesByWeekSimulationFormerlyScoresByWeekSimulation
tags.description: Gets simulated live scores of NFL games, covering the Conference Championship games on January 21, 2018.

tags.name: PlayByPlaySimulation
tags.description: Gets simulated live play-by-play of NFL games, covering the Conference Championship games on January 21, 2018.

tags.name: BAKERChangelog
tags.description: Returns the most recent 100 changelog events that triggered new simulation runs.

tags.name: BAKERGameProjections
tags.description: Returns the projected game and team outcomes for a given game.

tags.name: BAKERPlayerProjectionsWeekAverage
tags.description: Returns the average projected statsistics for the top 50 players sorted by the sort_by parameter.Can be filtered by game_id, team, and position.To retreive all players efficiently, use the /team endpoint or the /stat endpoint and call them for each team or statistic required.

tags.name: BAKERPlayerProjectionsWeekAveragePerTeam
tags.description: Returns the average projections for all players on the specified team.

tags.name: BAKERPlayerProjectionsWeekAverageSingleStatistic
tags.description: Returns the average projected statistic for up to 500 players sorted in descending order.

tags.name: BAKERPlayerProjectionsWeekPercentilePerTeam
tags.description: Returns a percentile of projections for all players on the specified team.

tags.name: BAKERPlayerProjectionsWeekPercentileSingleStatistic
tags.description: Returns the percentile of the projected statistic for up to 500 players sorted in descending order.

tags.name: BAKERWeeklyBestBets
tags.description: Weekly Best Bets

tags.name: BAKERWeeklyBestBetsGamePicks
tags.description: Weekly Best Bets Game Picks

tags.name: ScoresBySeason
tags.description: Game scores for a specified season.

parameters.description: The number of plays to progress in this NFL live game simulation. Example entries are 0, 1, 2, 3, 150, 200, etc.

get.summary: Get detailed information about past, present, and future timeframes.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of timeframes to return.  Valid entries are current or upcoming or completed or recent or all.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the news.brExamples: 2017-JUL-31, 2017-SEP-01.

get.summary: Returns the list of MarketTypes, BetTypes, PeriodTypes, OutcomeTypes, and ResultTypes to map the IDs to descriptive names. Also includes a list of the MarketType, BetType  PeriodType combinations which we will have resulting for.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.summary: The list of current BettingEvents for the given date. Events in this include market information but no outcomes will be included here. Intended to allow both visibility to Events in order to match up Events - Scores via the included ScoreID (where applicable) as well as provide a list of MarketIDs which are included in the given event.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the game(s). brExamples: 2020-09-10, 2020-09-13.

get.summary: Returns the full list of BetttingEvents for the given season. This does not take season-type (PRE/POST etc) into account. Intended for those who need to tie BettingEventIDs to ScoreIDs.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the seasonbrExamples: 2020, 2021, etc.

get.summary: Returns available Futures outcomes for the given season. Does not include line movement.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season (with optional season type).brExamples: 2020REG, 2020PRE, 2020POST, 2021, etc.

get.summary: Returns full line movement for a given BettingMarket. Is intended for historical data purposes and not for the most up to the second lines.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: The MarketId of the desired market for which to pull all outcomes/bets.

get.summary: Returns the markets and available outcomes for a given BettingEventID.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The EventId of the desired event/game for which to pull all betting markets (includes outcomes/bets).

get.summary: Returns the markets and available outcomes for a given ScoreID. Works the same as by BettingEventID but requires less ID mapping.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: scoreid
parameters.description: The ScoreID of the desired game/score for which to pull all betting markets (includes outcomes/bets).

get.summary: Returns Markets and available outcomes for a given event and market type requested. A lighter call than by BettingEventID as it only includes markets tagged with the specific MarketType (1 - GameLines, 2 - Player Props, etc -- full list available in the BettingMetaData endpoint).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The EventId of the desired event/game for which to pull all betting markets (includes outcomes/bets).

parameters.name: marketTypeID
parameters.description: The Market Type ID of the desired MarketTypes to pull. Some common types include: 1 for Game Lines, 2 for Player Props, 3 for Team Props, 6 for Game Props

get.summary: Gets the available player props Markets  Outcomes for a given ScoreID.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: scoreid
parameters.description: The unique ScoreID of the game in question.

get.summary: Returns all outcomes under this market which have a result type associated. Will return empty list if resulting has not yet processed for the given game. Resulting processes shortly after game closing.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: The MarketId of the desired market for which to pull all outcomes/bets.

get.summary: List of Money and Bet Percentage splits for each outcome type available in this market. This specific endpoint will return the movement from this market as well as the most recent.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: The BettingMarketID of the market you would like to get splits for. Note that markets we do not have split information on will return an empty response.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the slates.brExamples: 2017-SEP-25, 2017-10-31.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season and the season type. If no season type is provided, then the default is regular season.          brExamples: 2015REG, 2015PRE, 2015POST

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: Week of the season. Valid values are as follows: Preseason 0 to 4, Regular Season 1 to 17, Postseason 1 to 4.          Example: 1

get.summary: Slate Ownership Projections for a specific slate. Projections are for GPP format ownership. Will return an empty list if the slate is not yet projected or not a slate we have projections for.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: slateId
parameters.description: SlateID of the DFS Slate you wish to get ownership projections for. Will have an empty SlateOwnershipProjections if this slate was not projected

get.summary: Grabs DFS Slates which have not yet started for which we have DFS Ownership projections.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season and the season type. If no season type is provided, then the default is regular season.          brExamples: 2015REG, 2015PRE, 2015POST.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: Week of the season. Valid values are as follows: Preseason 0 to 4, Regular Season 1 to 17, Postseason 1 to 4.          Example: 1

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season and the season type. If no season type is provided, then the default is regular season.          brExamples: 2015REG, 2015PRE, 2015POST.

get.summary: List of Money and Bet Percentage splits for each market and their respective outcome types available in this game. This specific endpoint will return current splits for each available market and no line movement.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: scoreId
parameters.description: The ScoreID of the desired game to get Betting Market Splits for

get.summary: Provides in-play odds data for a given week. This means odds for games which are in-progress. Only serves the most recently seen data  does not include line movement.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season, with optional season type. brExamples: 2018, 2018POST, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: The week of the scores (games). brExamples: 1, 2, etc.

get.summary: Provides in-play odds line movement data for a given game. This means odds for games which are in-progress. Serves full line movement and is intended for showing the trend over a game rather than the most up-to-the second lines.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: scoreid
parameters.description: The ScoreID of an NFL score (game).  ScoreIDs can be found in the Scores API.  Valid entries are 16654 or 16667

get.summary: Returns the non-full-game odds for games in a given week  season. This means odds such as 1st-half or 1st-quarter, rather than full game. Only returns the most recently seen odds, not-including line movement.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season, with optional season type. brExamples: 2018, 2018POST, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: The week of the scores (games). brExamples: 1, 2, etc.

get.summary: Returns the non-full-game odds for games in a given ScoreID. This means odds such as 1st-half or 1st-quarter, rather than full game. Returns the full line movement for the given game. This endpoint has a longer cache as it is meant for historical data/line movement rather than the most up to the second line.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: scoreid
parameters.description: The ScoreID of an NFL score (game).  ScoreIDs can be found in the Scores API.  Valid entries are 16654 or 16667

get.summary: Returns the full-game core odds for games in a given week  season. This means moneyline, spread, and total. Only returns the most recently seen odds, not-including line movement.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season, with optional season type. brExamples: 2018, 2018POST, etc.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: The week of the scores (games). brExamples: 1, 2, etc.

get.summary: Returns the full-game core odds for a given ScoreID. This means moneyline, spread, and total. Only returns the most recently seen odds, not-including line movement. This endpoint has a longer cache as it is meant for historical data/line movement rather than the most up to the second line.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.summary: This method returns all box scores for a given season and week, but only returns player stats that have changed in the last X minutes. You can also filter by type of player stats to include, such as traditional fantasy players, IDP players or all players.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Year of the season and the season type. If no season type is provided, then the default is regular season.          brExamples: 2015REG, 2015PRE, 2015POST.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: Week of the season. Valid values are as follows: Preseason 0 to 4, Regular Season 1 to 17, Postseason 1 to 4.          Example: 1

parameters.name: playerstoinclude
parameters.description: The subcategory of players to include in the returned PlayerGame records. Possible values include:brbrall Returns all playersbrfantasy Returns traditional fantasy players (QB, RB, WR, TE, K, DST)bridp Returns traditional fantasy players and IDP players.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Only returns player statistics that have changed in the last X minutes.  You specify how many minutes in time to go back.  Valid entries are:br1, 2, etc.

get.summary: Returns the average projected statsistics for the top 50 players sorted by the sort_by parameter.Can be filtered by game_id, team, and position.To retreive all players efficiently, use the /team endpoint or the /stat endpoint and call them for each team or statistic required.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

get.summary: Returns the average projections for all players on the specified team.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: The Key indicator of the team desired. Example: NE

get.summary: Returns the average projected statistic for up to 500 players sorted in descending order.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: The name of the statistic desired. Example: rushing_attempts

get.summary: Returns a percentile of projections for all players on the specified team.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: The Key indicator of the team desired. Example: NE

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: The desired percentile for the distribution of the projections. Example: 90

get.summary: Returns the percentile of the projected statistic for up to 500 players sorted in descending order.

parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: The name of the statistic desired. Example: rushing_attempts

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: The desired percentile for the distribution of the projections. Example: 90
